1.0.name: wordpress/the-saver
1.0.description:
Thanks to a brainstorm in the Swedish WordPress Group, this useful plugin was created.

Thanks to this plugin, you can press CTRL+S in ANY browser to save the work you're working with, including posts and pages.

Some features:

  • Saves your current work by pressing CTRL+S
  • Works in all browsers (thanks Binny V A)
  • No jQuery
  • Made in Sweden
